nodes.short_description:
"Sweet Surrender" es un juego de disparos roguelike que se desarrolla en una megatorre distópica, donde debes adaptarte a un entorno despiadado, acelerado y lleno de acción.

** Ahora presenta progresión permanente con clases desbloqueables y actualizables! **

COMBATE ÁGIL – Usa una variedad de armas, herramientas y explosivos para eliminar las fuerzas enemigas.

EXPLORA Y SOBREVIVE – Niveles generados por procedimientos llenos de sorpresas en cada esquina. Ten cuidado.

Roguelike shooter in a dystopian megatower— adapt to a ruthless, fast-paced action-packed environment.

ENDLESSLY REPLAYABLE: Procedurally-generated levels, mountains of weapons, and upgradeable classes: adapt your playstyle to brave the never-ending onslaught.

AGILE COMBAT: Run through levels, grappling and ziplining across enemy territory to gun down the opposition.

WEAPONS & UPGRADES: Pick from an arsenal of weapons, upgrading your gameplay with stat boosts and world-shattering enhancement.

« Sweet Surrender » mêle jeu de tir et Roguelike.

** Maintenant avec Classes Déblocables **

COMBAT AGILE - Utilisez armes, mêlées et explosifs pour éliminer les machines qui vous chassent. Mélangez les améliorations pour obtenir des combis combustibles. Effets paralysants IEM, force accrue, balles explosives, entre des douzaines d’autres !

EXPLORATION ET SURVIE - Faites exploser des murs pour découvrir des passages secrets. Survolez des étendues de lave en tyrolienne.

Roguelike-Shooter in einer dystopischen Megacity. Passe dich an eine gnadenlose, actiongeladene Umgebung an.

** Jetzt mit freischaltbaren Klassen, die verbessert werden können! **

EIN RIESIGES ARSENAL - Nutze Waffen, Schraubenschlüssel oder Granaten, um die feindlichen Maschinen auszuschalten. Probiere eine Vielzahl an Upgrades aus und kombiniere sie für chaotische Kombos.

ERKUNDE UND ÜBERLEBE - Prozedural generierte Level mit Überraschungen hinter jeder Ecke. Sei auf der Hut.

nodes.display_name: スウィート・サレンダー
nodes.short_description: 『スウィート・サレンダー』は、デストピアにそびえ立つ塔を舞台にしたローグライクシューティングゲームです。この熾烈で過酷な世界を生き延びるのです。

nodes.long_description:
<스윗 서렌더>는 디스토피아 메가타워를 배경으로 펼쳐지는 빠르고 치열한 로그라이크 슈팅 게임입니다. 인류의 마지막 생존자로서 끝없는 적을 뚫고 정상에 도달해야 합니다.

# 현대적 아케이드 로그라이크 × VR

{1203569131373949}

**민첩한 전투** – 스냅 회전, 부드러운 회전, 텔레포트 등 다양한 이동 옵션 제공. 그래플 훅으로 숨겨진 구역을 찾고, 집라인을 타고 용암 위를 가로지르세요. 원하는 방식으로 자유롭게 움직이세요!

{1331786548077857}

**다양한 무기 플레이** – 권총, 샷건, 소총, 저격총, 폭발 무기, 근접 무기 등 원하는 모든 무기가 준비되어 있습니다!

{1697188137837589}

**업그레이드 및 강화** – 전투 중 칩을 수집해 EMP 공격, 시간 감속, 에너지 흡수 등 강력한 능력을 해제하세요. 나만의 빌드를 완성하고 전장을 지배하세요!

{1355977925916581}

**학습과 적응** – 매번 새로운 도전! 지름길과 숨겨진 구역을 발견하고, 적의 기계 지휘 체계를 무너뜨리세요. 전 세계가 당신의 전장이 됩니다!

{1218470719800975}

**클래스와 성장** – 메딕, 그레네이더, 스나이퍼, 리퍼 등 새로운 클래스를 잠금 해제하고 강화하세요. 자신만의 전투 스타일을 찾거나, 극한의 루나틱 모드에 도전해보세요!
nodes.short_description: <스윗 서렌더>는 디스토피아 메가타워를 배경으로 무자비하고 빠르게 진행되며 액션이 가득한 환경에 적응해나가는 로그라이크 슈팅 게임입니다.

nodes.long_description:
Sweet Surrender is a Roguelike shooter set in a dystopian megatower where you must adapt to a ruthless, fast-paced action-packed environment.

Use explosives, melee weapons, guns and upgrades to take down the machines hunting you as you fight your way to the summit through procedurally-generated levels.

Agile Combat - 
Use an array of weapons, tools and explosives to dispatch enemy forces. Blast through walls to uncover secrets, aim for weak points and adapt to the behaviour of your enemy. Zipline across lava, grapple hook through corridors as you gun down machine security forces.

Upgrades and Enhancements - 
Discover upgrade chips that can heighten your abilities. Gain EMP effects on your weapons, increase your strength and speed, siphon energy from your enemies.

Unlockables and Progression -
Achieve new milestones the further you advance. Track your personal stats and enemy encounters, catalog messages from those who came before you. Discover new weapon effects, combine upgrades.
nodes.short_description: Sweet Surrender is a Roguelike shooter set in a dystopian megatower where you must adapt to a ruthless, fast-paced action-packed environment.

nodes.long_description:
"Sweet Surrender" es un juego de disparos roguelike que se desarrolla en una megatorre distópica, donde debes adaptarte a un entorno despiadado, acelerado y lleno de acción.

Usa explosivos, armas de mano, pistolas y actualizaciones para derribar las máquinas que te persiguen mientras luchas por llegar a la cima pasando los niveles generados por procedimientos.

Combate ágil: 
usa una variedad de armas, herramientas y explosivos para eliminar las fuerzas enemigas. Atraviesa las paredes con explosiones para descubrir secretos, apunta a los puntos débiles y adáptate al comportamiento de tus enemigos. Cruza ríos de lava en tirolesa, usa arpeos para trepar por los corredores mientras reduces a disparos las fuerzas de seguridad de las máquinas.

Actualizaciones y mejoras: 
descubre los chips de actualización que pueden elevar tus habilidades. Obtén efectos EMP para tus armas, aumenta tu fuerza y velocidad, extrae la energía de tus enemigos.
nodes.short_description: "Sweet Surrender" es un juego de disparos roguelike que se desarrolla en una megatorre distópica, donde debes adaptarte a un entorno despiadado, acelerado y lleno de acción.

nodes.long_description:
<스윗 서렌더>는 디스토피아 메가타워를 배경으로 무자비하고 빠르게 진행되며 액션이 가득한 환경에 적응해나가는 로그라이크 슈팅 게임입니다.

폭발물, 근접 무기, 총 및 업그레이드를 이용해 알고리즘에 따라 생성되는 각 층에서 여러분을 쫓는 기계를 처치하고 정상까지 싸워나가세요.

민첩한 전투 - 
여러 가지 무기, 도구 및 폭발물을 이용해 적군을 신속하게 물리치세요. 벽을 폭파해 숨겨진 비밀을 파헤치고, 약점을 노려 적의 움직임에 대응하세요. 집라인으로 용암을 넘고, 그래플 훅으로 통로를 가로질러 기계 보안 부대를 총으로 격추하세요.

업그레이드 및 기능 향상 - 
능력을 향상하는 업그레이드 칩을 찾아보세요. 무기에 EMP 효과를 부여하고, 힘과 속도를 높이며, 적에게서 에너지를 흡수하세요.

잠금 해제 콘텐츠 및 진행도 -
앞으로 진행해나가면서 새로운 마일스톤을 달성하세요. 개인 통계 및 적과의 교전, 먼저 왔던 플레이어들의 카탈로그 메시지를 확인해보세요. 새로운 무기 효과를 얻고 업그레이드를 조합해보세요.
nodes.short_description: <스윗 서렌더>는 디스토피아 메가타워를 배경으로 무자비하고 빠르게 진행되며 액션이 가득한 환경에 적응해나가는 로그라이크 슈팅 게임입니다.

nodes.long_description:
« Sweet Surrender » mêle jeu de tir et Roguelike. Avancez dans une mégatour dystopique.

Traversez des niveaux générés aléatoirement en utilisant explosifs, armes de corps à corps, armes à feu et augmentations pour éliminer les machines.

Combats vifs : 
Utilisez un large choix d’armes, d’outils et d’explosifs. Découvrez des passages secrets. Adaptez votre comportement en fonction de vos ennemis et ciblez leurs points faibles. Traversez des étendues de lave en tyrolienne et franchissez les couloirs à l’aide d’un grappin tout en abattant les machines.

Augmentations et améliorations : 
Trouvez des puces d’augmentation. Dotez vos armes d’un effet IEM, augmentez votre force et votre vitesse, ou siphonnez l’énergie de vos ennemis.

Contenus déblocables et progression :
Franchissez de nouvelles étapes au fil de votre progression. Suivez vos statistiques. Répertoriez les messages laissés par vos prédécesseurs. Découvrez de nouveaux effets pour vos armes, et combinez les augmentations.
nodes.short_description: « Sweet Surrender » mêle jeu de tir et Roguelike. Dans une mégatour dystopique, vous devez constamment vous adapter à un environnement sans pitié et une action au rythme effréné.

nodes.long_description:
„Sweet Surrender“ ist ein Roguelike-Shooter in einem dystopischen Megaturm. Dort musst du dich an eine gnadenlose, tempo- und actionreiche Umgebung anpassen.

Schalte die Maschinen, die dich jagen, mit Sprengstoffen, Waffen, Gewehren und Upgrades aus und kämpfe dich durch prozedural generierte Levels.

Agiler Kampf –
Setze Waffen, Werkzeuge und Sprengstoffe gegen Feindtrupps ein. Sprenge dich durch Wände, entdecke Geheimnisse, ziele auf Schwachstellen und passe dich dem Verhalten deines Gegners an. Springe über Lava, hangle dich mit Greifhaken durch Gänge und schieße Maschinen-Sicherheitstrupps ab.

Upgrades und Verbesserungen –
Entdecke Upgrade-Chips und verbessere deine Fähigkeiten. Erhalte EMP-Effekte auf Waffen, erhöhe Stärke und Tempo, sauge Energie von Feinden ab.

Freischaltbare Items und Fortschritt –
Erreiche Meilensteine, je weiter du kommst. Verfolge deine Statistiken und Kämpfe, katalogisiere Nachrichten von jenen vor dir. Entdecke neue Waffeneffekte, kombiniere Upgrades.
nodes.short_description: „Sweet Surrender“ ist ein Roguelike-Shooter in einem dystopischen Megaturm. Dort musst du dich an eine gnadenlose, tempo- und actionreiche Umgebung anpassen.

nodes.display_name: スウィート・サレンダー
nodes.long_description:
『スウィート・サレンダー』は、デストピアにそびえ立つ塔を舞台にしたローグライクシューティングゲームです。あなたはこの熾烈で過酷な世界を生き延びなければなりません。

爆弾、近接武器、銃、またアップグレードを駆使して襲い掛かるロボットたちを倒し、自動生成ステージを切り抜けて、頂上を目指しましょう。

スピーディー戦闘 - 
様々な武器や道具、爆弾を駆使して敵軍を倒しましょう。壁を爆破して秘密を解き明かしたり、弱点を狙って敵の動きを見極めるのです。ジップラインで溶岩を飛び越えたり、グラップリングフックで颯爽と飛びながらロボット警備隊を撃ち倒してやりましょう。

アップグレード＆強化 - 
アップグレードチップを見つけると、能力を強化できます。武器にEMPエフェクトが搭載されたり、力や素早さが上がったり、敵から体力を吸い取れるようになります。

アンロック要素＆成長 -
先に進めば進むほど、あなたはどんどん成長していきます。自分のプレイデータや戦闘結果を見返したり、登場人物たちからのメッセージを整理することもできます。新たな武器エフェクトを見つけ、アップグレードを組み合わせていきましょう。
nodes.short_description: 『スウィート・サレンダー』は、デストピアにそびえ立つ塔を舞台にしたローグライクシューティングゲームです。この熾烈で過酷な世界を生き延びるのです。

nodes.change_log:
**Update 15.1 \- Roses Are Red, Robots Are Dead**  
**Valentine decorations, seasonal settings, and a round of QoL polish.**

Dear Sweet Surrender community,

A short but sweet update 15.1 to celebrate the rise of our lord, St. Valentine. We’ve expanded our seasonal theme system to support the Valentine celebration. Our robots are sporting adorable, love-filled attire for you to blast apart. Gears and gear particles are also subtly modified. 

You can now configure “Seasons” directly in the UI menu. Leave it on *Default*, turn seasons off entirely, or manually select your favorite theme at any time. By default, the Valentine’s celebration season will last for roughly two weeks.

The rest of the update is focused on Quality of Life improvements:

* We’ve added a **Crouch** button. This is disabled by default, but in the Movement menu, you can bind to your preferred primary face button or left/right stick click  
* **Chips Statuses** have been expanded to dynamically show their effects. For example, the Mighty Mech chip (which scales up your damage based on the amount of gears you currently have) now shows the exact damage bonus.  
* Added an option (in the Comfort menu) to lock your health bar’s horizontal movement. Previously this would gently lag behind your head turns, which some players found uncomfortable. You can now have it synced to your head.  
* The **Chips UI** has finally been improved so you can CLEARLY see which info belongs to the left chip and which to the right. A ground-breaking achievement four years in the making  
* Improved **Grenade Launcher** usability; it’s now easier to land shots on the final boss and the small grenade launcher now reloads instantly. Be careful with it\!  
* Fixed a hole in the floor under a broken wall in Industrial area

Love hurts. Especially when it explodes. Enjoy\!

# Update 15 - Quality of Life Improvements

## Improvements

* **Two over-the-shoulder weapon slots** (with UI feedback and improved haptics)  
* **20 new chip variations** based on existing chips  
* **Progression unlock/restore based on your achievements**  
* Increased throwing knife damage  
* Improved rotational recoil  
* **Usability:** new weapon/hand settings for horizontal angle and x, y, z offsets  
* **Usability:** improved chip pop-up behavior to be less annoying. New UI option to disable tutorial text.  
* **Humor**: Save\&Quit station is physically destroyed when you leave the start room

## Fixes

* **Classes**: fixed Grenadier progression (can progress again on the “Kill X enemies with a grenade launcher”)  
* **Balance:** doubled self-damage from explosions  
* **Usability**: improved grabbing robot parts and holding them. Currently uses Tomato Presence mode (no hands)  
* **Usability**: fixed robot part jitter  
* **Usability**: fixed broken occlusion of spider parts  
* **Usability**: Back slot icons now work for all weapons, even when transitioning to new level  
* **Usability**: improved teleportation into acid pools. Prevent teleporting if acid is still up  
* **Usability:** improved behavior of teleporting into jump pads  
* **Usability**: fixed weapon tier visuals on a couple weapons  
* **Usability**: trophies can be picked up  
* **Usability**: improved floor, lava and teleport detection \- should hopefully address the height issues some players have reported  
* **Usability**: fixed tutorial handgun not being throwable  
* **Usability**: fixed a number of chip descriptions Explosive Returns, Blood Frenzy, Vigorous Vitality, Fuller Auto)  
* **Usability**: fixed missing Tunnel Man, and tweaked some confirmation text  
* **Usability:** Improved grappling hook behavior to avoid permanent fly mode when used in combination with jump pad  
* **Achievements**: fix for “no shortcut” achievement when using Save\&Quit  
* **Stims**: nano stims no longer applied twice  
* **Stims**: prevent nano stims from being applied while transitioning levels  
* **Chips**: fixed a number of chip behaviors in edge cases  
* **Chips**: fixed status description of Vigorous Vitality (gameplay was fine, just the text feedback)  
* **Chips**: fixed Last Stand upgrade  
* **Chips**: removed last uses of Toughness chip (medic class)  
* **Enemies**: fix for unkillable AI (this was a super tough one to track down)  
* **Enemies**: improved enemy path-finding and patrolling behavior  
* **Enemies:** will move if they stay in one spot for too long  
* **Enemies**: Improved drill bot search for crystals  
* **Enemies:** less likely to hit other objects  
* **Enemies:** grenadier robots shoot at you again  
* **Enemies**: improvements to spider gunner enemy navigation (should fix it spawning in ceilings)  
* **Enemies**: improved large robot behavior in Industrial Area when it comes to alarm buttons  
* **Enemies:** Improved Drone behavior (they were colliding with their own colliders, which caused weird movement behaviors)  
* **Levels**: fixed fuel cell and acid grenade spawning behaviors  
* **Levels**: fixed several missing enemy spawns  
* **Levels**: fixed a few missing models in Slums, removed some extra barrels  
* **Levels:** switched some windows in Industrial Area to breakable glass  
* **UI**: Show katana icon correctly when holstered  
* **Visuals**: adjusted all bullet impact decals to only use local scaling (no more stretched bullet marks)  
* **Visuals**: improved transparency on bullet marks (for Quest 2 non bloom mode)  
* **Visuals**: fixed acid vignette color  
* **Stability**: fixed double-barrel \+ double mag chip combos crashing the game  
* **Stability**: removed camera from a room in the mines that caused weird things to happen  
* **Stability**: fixed colliders on Slum Explosive barrels  
* **Stability**: better error checking in enemy targeting  
* **Stability**: better logging to track down room occlusion issues  
* **Audio**: reduced the chance of audio crunching during heavy fire fights.
